quote: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: To enjoy the glow of good health, you must exercise.
author: Gene Tunney

quote: The body achieves what the mind believes.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: What we fear doing most is usually what we most need to do.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: First, say to yourself what you would be; and then do what you have to do.
author: Epictetus

quote: It is not the mountain we conquer, but ourselves.
author: Sir Edmund Hillary

quote: The greatest wealth is health.
author: Virgil

quote: Discipline equals freedom.
author: Jocko Willink

quote: Motivation gets you started. Habit keeps you going.
author: Jim Ryun

quote: You don't have to be extreme, just consistent.
We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
author: Aristotle

quote: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: If you want something you've never had, you must be willing to do something you've never done.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: No pain, no gain.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Don't limit your challenges. Challenge your limits.
author: Jerry Dunn

quote: The only bad workout is the one that didn't happen.
Push yourself because no one else is going to do it for you.
Success starts with self-discipline.
It never gets easier, you just get stronger.
author: Greg LeMond

quote: Strive for progress, not perfection.
author: David Perlmutter

quote: Eat for the body you want, not the one you have.
Your diet is a bank account. Good food choices are good investments.
author: Bethenny Frankel

quote: Take care of your body. It's the only place you have to live.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Health is not about the weight you lose, but the life you gain.
author: Dr. Josh Axe

quote: You are what you eat — so don't be fast, cheap, easy, or fake.
It is never too late to be what you might have been.
author: George Eliot

quote: In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: You become what you give your attention to.
author: Epictetus

quote: A fit body, a calm mind, a house full of love. These things cannot be bought — they must be earned.
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: Man cannot remake himself without suffering, for he is both the marble and the sculptor.
author: Alexis Carrel

quote: Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.
author: Dalai Lama XIV

quote: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: Your health is an investment, not an expense.
author: John Quelch
